name: Pinocchio - Book & Games (Lite)
description:
Beautiful retina display images.

Pinocchio is a wonderful storybook multilingual, illustrated by Michelle Martin, with text and narrations that your kids will love.

Two games are included, "Find pairs" & "Jigsaw puzzle", your kids will have lots of fun.

Features:

- Automatic navigation and narration make it very simple to use.
- Read it at your own speed with the "Read yourself option for the book
- Simple story for the little ones, easy to read.
- Several languages supported: English, Spanish and French.
- Narrated by a native speaker on each language.
- Illustrated characters especially for your little ones.
- A fun and challenging "Find pairs" game to increase your children's brain activity.
- Jigsaw puzzle with 12 or 24 pieces to have even more fun.

Extras:

- More jigsaw puzzles.
- Choose more cards for "Find pairs" game.
- Take pictures on your iPad and mix it with some characters of the story.
- Record you own voice while reading the book.

Enjoy.
